channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Warren Buffett gave this timely investment advice at Berkshire’s annual meeting
item.description: The Berkshire Hathaway CEO had some wise words for investors after a tumultuous April for equities.

item.title: Nvidia and these other tech stocks look like winners this earnings season
item.description: Analysts are “relieved” after Big Tech companies remained committed to large AI budgets.

item.title: Skechers’ stock rockets on buyout deal after tumbling in wake of tariff concerns
item.description: Last week, the company reported results that missed expectations and withdrew its full-year outlook.

item.title: Why tariffs are actually going to boost U.S. companies — and the stock market
item.description: Wall Street is not the economy, and Trump should remind Americans of that.

item.title: Services sector, the main engine of the U.S. economy, strengthened in April
item.description: Manufacturing has dominated the news because of tariffs, but uncertainty has spread over into the services sector.

item.title: Bryan Johnson wants to start a new religion in which “the body is God”

item.title: The great cognitive migration: How AI is reshaping human purpose, work and meaning
item.description: Humans need to embrace domains where AI still falters, and where human creativity, ethics and emotion emain indispensable.

item.title: Not everything needs an LLM: A framework for evaluating when AI makes sense
item.description: The answer to 'What customer needs requires an AI solution?' isn’t always 'Yes.' LLMs are still expensive and not always accurate.

item.title: RSAC 2025: Why the AI agent era means more demand for CISOS

item.title: Roblox breaks ground on data center in Brazil for early 2026
item.description: At Gamescom Latam, Roblox announced it has broken ground on a new data center in Brazil -- slated to go live in early 2026.
